title: Postcard, "Restaurant Florent:  Ferraro/ear", 1991
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Recto: Vertically and centrally positioned, in tones of gray and white, a photograph of an ear in profile occupies most of the space. The message, also centered, occupies five lines of black type, with the first line capitalized, the remaining lines in lower case, and the third line in larger, darker type, reads: Aids/ partnership/ ferraro florent/ discrimination, civil rights. M&Co is imprinted vertically in the lower left corner. 
Verso: Also vertically positioned, the message, on ten lines, with lines one, two and four in darker type, is as follows: florent morellet and the/ gays and lesbians for ferraro/ invite you to a reception for/ Geraldine Ferraro; the remaining lines concern location, date, etc.
